name: Design
description: In the Design phase, creative concepts and plans are formulated to outline the visual and functional aspects of the project.

name: Engineer
description: The Engineer phase involves the technical implementation and detailed planning of the design, translating ideas into a structured blueprint.

name: Manufacture
description: Manufacturing encompasses the physical production of components and products according to the specifications defined in the engineering phase.

name: Calibrate
description: The Calibrate phase focuses on fine-tuning and adjusting the system to ensure optimal performance, accuracy, and reliability.
